Proposal.applicants¶
Proposal.continue_url()¶
Proposal.created_by¶
Proposal.current_session()¶

Returns the current (incomplete) Session. - If all Sessions are completed, the last Session is returned. - If no Sessions have yet been created, None is returned.

Proposal.current_study()¶

Returns the current (incomplete) Study. - If all Studies are completed, the last Study is returned. - If no Studies have yet been created, None is returned.

Proposal.first_study()¶

Returns the first Study in this Proposal, or None if there’s none.

Proposal.funding¶

Proposal.get_status()¶

Retrieves the current status for a Proposal

Proposal.get_status_display(*moreargs, **morekwargs)¶
Proposal.last_study()¶

Returns the last Study in this Proposal, or None if there’s none.
